patthana15.52:1.1_0: Noupādānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.52:2.1_0: Upādānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.52:3.1_0: Nokilesaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
